title: What’s the meaning of the song, Eternal Flame by The Bangles? - Quora

response.answer_text: There really ARE “eternal flames” in various places, like John F. Kennedy’s grave in Arlington Cemetery. The flame there never goes out, and will burn forever. When Susannah Hoffs wrote this song, she was using that eternal flame as a symbol for undying love.She’s asking the man she loves if he feels the same way about her.
